org.apache.hadoop.mapred

Class ThriftJobTrackerPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapred.JobTrackerPlugin
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapred.ThriftJobTrackerPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.ServicePlugin

    public class ThriftJobTrackerPlugin
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapred.JobTrackerPlugin
implements org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable
    Exposes JobTracker APIs as a Thrift service, running by default on DEFAULT_THRIFT_ADDRESS.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_THRIFT_ADDRESS
      Default address and port this server will bind to, in case nothing is found in the configuration object.
      static org.slf4j.Logger logger 
      static java.lang.String THRIFT_ADDRESS_PROPERTY
      Name of the configuration property of the Thrift server address
